d1_flags: 1. goto C8E95B if BOOGEY_TENT_DEFEATED is set
1. goto C8E95D if MASTER_BELCH_DEFEATED is set
1. goto C8E9E8 if GIYGAS_DEFEATED is set
d1_text:
Npc0527:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG GIYGAS_DEFEATED L_C8E9E8]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG MASTER_BELCH_DEFEATED L_C8E95D]
ï¿½I'm only telling you this because you look like you're just passing through.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The truth is,[PAUSE 15] I work for the monsters.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The humans seem to be losing,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½so I'm on the zombies' side for my own protection.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The zombies' leader likes Fly Honey.  He makes his followers collect it.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You know--bees make bee honey and flies make Fly Honey.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The zombie leader is strong because[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½he always eats peanut butter and Fly Honey sandwiches...[GOTO_IF_FLAG BOOGEY_TENT_DEFEATED L_C8E95B]
[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I got lots of Fly Honey stored in the tent to the south.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'll deliver it to the zombie leader soon.[HALT][END]
